contentList.content: You regain one use of your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="WildShape">Wild Shape</LSTag> after a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> and all uses after a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Spend a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag> to replenish a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="WildShape">Wild Shape Charge</LSTag> and vice versa.
Spend a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="WildShape">Wild Shape Charge</LSTag> to replenish a Level 1 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag>.
Spend a Level [1] <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag> to replenish a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="WildShape">Wild Shape Charge</LSTag>.

The number of times you can use Moonlight Step.
It is equal to your Wisdom Modifier (minimum 1).

Teleport to an unoccupied space you can see within [1], also gaining <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on the next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> you make before the end of your turn.
<LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on the next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Whenever you use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="CL_Teleportation_OneDnD_MoonlightStep">Moonlight Step</LSTag>, you can also teleport one Ally within [1] of you.

Teleport yourself and up to one ally within [1] to an unoccupied space you can see within [2], also gaining <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on the next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> you make before the end of your turn.
